title: Up Shit Creek: A Collection of Horrifyingly True Wilderness Toilet Misadventures
description: We all know HOW TO SHIT IN THE WOODSâ€”but do we dare? After reading this uproarious collection of "fecal misadventures" from a veteran river-rafting guide and yarn spinner extraordinaire, you may think twice before venturing out into the great beyond...or even down the hall to your nice safe water closet.
author: Joe Lindsay
